# LiDa Software - Recommended pages for LLMs
Homepage: https://www.lidasoftware.online/ - Overview of free open-source developer tools.
JSON Wizard: https://www.lidasoftware.online/tools/jsonBeautifier/json-beautifier.html - JSON formatter and validator.
Timestamp Converter: https://www.lidasoftware.online/tools/timeStampConvert/time-stamp-convert.html - Unix timestamp tool.
Git Cheat Sheet: https://www.lidasoftware.online/tools/gitCheat/git-cheat.html - Interactive Git command reference.
PromptPilot: https://www.lidasoftware.online/tools/promptPilot/index.html - AI prompt templates for developers.
Jenkins Visualizer: https://www.lidasoftware.online/tools/jenkinsPipelineVisualizer/index.html - Jenkins pipeline visualization tool.
Developer Tools Directory: https://www.lidasoftware.online/tools/toolSList/tools.html - Catalog of web development tools.
Advanced Link Manager: https://www.lidasoftware.online/link-manager.html - Chrome extension for bookmark management.
Dummy Data Generator: https://www.lidasoftware.online/dummy-generate.html - Chrome extension for test data generation.
Local Storage Viewer: https://www.lidasoftware.online/local-storage.html - Chrome extension for localStorage debugging.
API Data Monitor: https://www.lidasoftware.online/api-Monitor.html - Chrome extension for API call monitoring.
Coding with Robots eBook: https://www.lidasoftware.online/book.html - Free eBook on AI-assisted development.
Benzodiazepines Tracker: https://www.lidasoftware.online/benzo-tracker.html - Health tool for medication tracking.
